modName: Konahriks Accoutrements - Dragon Priest Armory Traduzione italiana
summary: This is only the translation of the mod Konahriks Accoutrements - Dragon Priest Armory, created by Edhelsereg
descriptionHtml:
This is only the translation of the mod Konahriks Accoutrements - Dragon Priest Armory, created by Edhelsereg.
All credit to him.
Questa è solo la traduzione della mod  Konahriks Accoutrements - Dragon Priest Armory, creata da Edhelsereg.
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32458
Scaricare e installare la sua mod, dopodichè sovrascrivere i file esp.
Ho tradotto anche l'add-on per Dragonborn.
